Section.name: About PITW
Section.description:
Priyadarshini Institute of Technology and Science for Women (PITW) is a part of Priyadarshini Group of Institutions which was founded in the year of 2009. It is the only engineering college of women in Chintalapudi which provides free hostel and bus facilities for its students. The main objective of the institute is to encourage the students for participating in Co-Curricular activities so that their soft skills can be developed. It offers Bachelor of Technology program in 05 streams and Master of Technology (M.Tech.) in 04 streams along with Diploma and Master of Business Administration (MBA) programs. It is affiliated by the Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University (JNTU), Kakinada and approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE).
It provides state of the art infrastructure facilities like Library, Hostel, Medical Center, Seminar Hall, Transportation and Canteen. The institute has a Placement Cell for imparting the perfect soft skills as well as technical training which are provided by the experts so that they can develop the strength of the students and mould them into competent professionals.
PITW AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.
